infodynamics.utils

Class ParsedProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.utils.ParsedProperties

  • public class ParsedProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility to parse properties files and retrieve requested property values.
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)
